How to get around Cinavia on PS3. Go to Settings > Sound Settings > Audio Output Settings and change from HDMI to Optical Digital. Then put a checkmark in all of the audio boxes. Then scroll down to Audio Multi-Output. Enable it. Select okay. Now watch the movie and enjoy it with no more pop-up box. You've just by-passed Cinavia. And NO you DON'T need an optical cable plugged into your PS3. Leave your HDMI cable plugged in as usual. Just follow the instructions above. Good luck.
